actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Salmon River in the State of Connecticut for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the entire main stem of the Salmon River in Connecticut for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Salmon River in the State of Connecticut for potential addition to the wild and scenic rivers system.
